data.title: Best Buddies
data.meta_description: Make a Friend Be a Friend Best Buddies is a worldwide volunteer based organization changes the lives of individuals of all abilities in countries all over the world, and has been positively effecting the lives of chapter members and communities where inclusion is an inspired joint mission. Learn More https://youtu.be/gFApJlT348Yhttps://youtu.be/gFApJlT348Y Best Buddies Philippines. Our Missionof Inclusion… Continue reading Home
data.text:
Since starting in 2014, we have established 15 chapters, created over 400 friendship matches, and touch the lives of over 30,000 Filipinos regardless of ability. Learn more about the work we have done to fight for inclusivity here in the country and what we will continue to do!

Be immersed in a diverse and inclusive society, have fun and meet new buddies, and make a difference in society, one friendship at a time!
